department: Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Canada
short_summary: Public Safety Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa, Ontario by March 31, 2023.
description: See the attached documents for details.
duration_in_months: As per the bid solicitation document.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement
шуいつкаCategory 5 and 6 Furniture Solution

- **Request ID**: PW-22-01010595

  - Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

- **Location of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Contracting Entity**: Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Canada
- **Contracting Officer**:
  - Name: Mireille Dumontier
  - Email: mireille.dumontier@ps-sp.gc.ca

- **End User Entity**: Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Canada
- **Dst Evaluation Criteria**: [to be determined]
- **Attachment**: {links to supporting documents}

This is a tender Request for Proposal (RFP) for Category 5 and 6 furniture solution. The procurement is governed by the following Supply Arrangement: E60PQ-140003/C. The contract duration will end on March 31, 2023 by the latest.

This tender Request for Proposal openly seeks offers from contractors who are certified holders of the above Supply Arrangement. The ultimate objective of this PA is to acquire office furniture to be in use in Support Space – Collaborative Furniture at a public government facility. For more information about the solication, please refer to the attached bid solicitation documents.

Please note that this tender requires specific security clearances which will be discussed upon request. Asking contractors to contact the contracting officer, to obtain additional information. Interested contractors are required to submit
